title: Let's be honest, Trinity force is probably going to get nerfed
body:
And instead of nerfing the damage proc, instead of removing some AD, can you just remove stinger from its build and have it build out of recurv bow instead?  This way it only loses 10% AS and 10% CDR,  bringing it back in line. When champs like Ekko are building this over {{item:3100}}, I see a problem with the item. And the item was fine until you changed it giving it 20% CDR

Sincerely, 

A concerned Jax player

Would increasing it's cost increase stop champions from Ekko or any champion in line to abuse fervor + trinity with a bruiser build. I highly doubt it. It's largely an on-hit item/AA oriented item, it shouldn't be giving 20% CDR, hell I'd argue it shouldn't even give 10% CDR,

I'd say it's less of an on-hit item than an on-spellcast item.  The parts of it that suggest on-hit are the attack speed, ad, and rage passive.  The cdr, mana, and sheen effects suggest weaving spells and auto attacks together. HP and movement speed are neutral.

1:) Trinity falls off late

2:) Increasing price makes it purchased later

3:) Trinity falls off faster

>it's largely an on-hit item/AA oriented item

wtf?

trinity doesnt fall of late game,it just gives you a slight disadvantage when you have a trinity and boots and the enemy with a slight lead has 2 completed items.trinity is the best choice a champion can have for a full build.

TF lets you deal a lot of damage when you get it

It's not that you're doing less damage lategame, the difference is that Tanks usually have good defenses at this point so you can't kill them and ADCs are dealing WAAAAAY more damage than you lategame so you can't really compete with that.

Because of this, fighters will usualy go Triforce > Tank (Hecarim, Skarner) or Triforce > Bruiser (Irelia, Vi). Triforce is usually all the damage these champs need to kill squishies which is why they need the durability to not blow up in one hit.

TL;DR Fighters that build TF > Tank/Bruiser fall off lategame because they do less damage to tanks and don't have enough damage to compete with real carries

NOTE: I didn't include Yasuo, Jax, Xin Zhao, etc. Those champions generally build multiple damage items after TF so they don't fall off

Yasuo building TF is kinda aids though, I think he is way more balanced when his optimal build is full crit + squishy. This warrants a Yasuo nerf and not a TF nerf.

Same with Ekko, he should be nerfed before TF gets nerfed. He's like a traditional Triforce champion except way more slippery and he has no drawbacks which is stupid.

If Trinity gave 30 AD, AS, and OnHit damage I would be absolutely stoked.

It was a real shame when Riot made it so Trinity no longer gave 30 of ALL THE THINGS.

Buff Wit's End to 42's as well. Seriously these thematic items are too cool.
